Home » 36P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 2 Kusalattika » 2.7 Pañhāvāra » 2.7.4 Paccayapaccanīyānuloma » Nanissayaduka
Pañcaka
Kusalattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayapaccanīyānuloma
Nanissayaduka
Pañcaka
1727Nanissayapaccayā nahetupaccayā naārammaṇapaccayā naadhipatipaccayā anantare satta, samanantare satta, upanissaye nava, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane tīṇi, kamme dve, āhāre ekaṃ, indriye ekaṃ, vippayutte tīṇi, atthiyā pañca, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate pañca…pe… .
<< Nanissayadukaup Navaka >>
